column4: well I think theres no answer to my problem headphone must be no good for ear is for that theres no solution to my problem
I have this bug since 6 or 7 month I fixe it for 1 week 4 month ago then it came back and now no solution
sound work perfectly on windows 7 is weird that on debian and ubuntu that are suppose to be better it doesnt work and no one got a solution

linux might be better, but its not for everyone, and since devices don't typically have linux drivers(like windows) if a device is not working out of the box, it may be to new to really have linux support.
